data.price: Janganlah kamu bersikap lemah, dan janganlah (pula) kamu bersedih hati, padahal kamulah orang-orang yang paling tinggi (derajatnya), jika kamu orang-orang yang beriman.
data.arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

meta.transliteration: walā tahinū walā taḥzanū wa-antumu al-aʿlawna in kuntum mu'minīna

dua.name: Dua for Resilience
dua.significanceReason: Encourages believers to maintain hope, strength, and emotional resilience during challenging times. Promotes psychological and spiritual endurance.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
